Address.Address1: SAN JOSE DE CALASANZ KM.2,800 AP.CORR.5128

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Los Abetos del Maestre Escuela in Cordoba, you'll be close to Marques de Viana Palace and Plaza de la Corredera. This hotel is within close proximity of Tendillas Plaza and Cordoba Bull Ring.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 36 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can enjoy drinks at a bar, take in a garden view, and even dine alfresco (weather permitting). You can also stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.
